name: Phishing Email Generator
description: Generate realistic phishing emails for security awareness training

solution.explanation: This module teaches you to recognize phishing email patterns and social engineering techniques.
steps: Analyze the generated phishing email carefully
Identify all the red flags present in the email
Understand the social engineering technique being used
Learn to recognize similar patterns in real-world scenarios
hints: Look for urgency tactics in the email
Be suspicious of requests for sensitive information
